kv6.7:1.3: Rūpaṁ rūpāyatanaṁ rūpadhātu nīlaṁ pītakaṁ lohitakaṁ odātaṁ cakkhuviññeyyaṁ cakkhusmiṁ paṭihaññati cakkhussa āpāthaṁ āgacchatīti?
kv6.7:3.9: Hañci “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇan”ti—
kv6.7:3.10: attheva suttanto, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv6.7:4.4: Nanu passati dvinnaṁ rukkhānaṁ antaraṁ, dvinnaṁ thambhānaṁ antaraṁ, tāḷacchiddaṁ vātapānacchiddanti?
kv6.7:4.6: Hañci passati dvinnaṁ rukkhānaṁ antaraṁ, dvinnaṁ thambhānaṁ antaraṁ, tāḷacchiddaṁ vātapānacchiddaṁ, tena vata re vattabbe—
